entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:29 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
